name: Elyonne: Chakawanka Island
description:
Music by : Florent combe - https://soundcloud.com/florentcombe-jv

The scenario :

Elyonne: Chakawanka Island Is a platform game where you play as a young adventurer who goes exploring the island of Chakawanka to finally become a true adventurer !

The controls

shoot : 'E' key stab : 'A' or 'Q' key (Azerty or querty) jump : the 'space' key or UP arrow

Feature

After each level go to the store, and do not hesitate to buy upgrades! Like the double jump or a bonus life!
